```java
         <plugin>
            <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
            <version>1.8</version>
            <executions>
              <execution>
                <phase>package</phase>
                <configuration>
                  <target>
                      <echo message="Calling ant task in package phase"/>
                  </target>
                </configuration>
                <goals>
                  <goal>run</goal>
                </goals>
              </execution>
            </executions>
          </plugin>
    ```

```java
      <project name="project-with-ant" default="echo" basedir=".">
        <description>
            Simple ant task to echo a string
        </description>

        <target name="echo">
            <echo message="Hello World"/>
       </target>
    </project> 
    ```
